import React, { Component } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react'; import "./styles.css" import { FaStar } from "react-icons/fa"; let Message ={ isread : true, sender: 'mido', subject: 'haconma matatta', date: '12/9/2020' } function MailBox (){ const[message] = useState(Message); return(

  • {message.sender}

    {message.subject}
    ${message.date}
    • ) } export default MailBox;
